channel.title: Changing the Starting area
channel.description: basically ive gone into player.java found the start area coords and changed then i also changed the coords on death so u appear at the new start area. however when u die u appear at the new start area that works fine. but when u make a new character u appear at the old start area. anyone no how to fix this im confuzzled.
